lines.text: Vietnam - I never thought I'd be coming back - I guess we never really CAN leave, can we?
Braddock! I'm warning you, don't step on any toes.
I don't step on toes, Littlejohn, I step on necks.
Walk or crawl, we're gonna make it!

[Lin, Braddock's Vietnamese wife, has been waiting 13 years for his return]
Oh, it doesn't matter.
You must pay for the crimes you have committed against my country!
Braddock! Braddock! Boogie Eye! Boogie Eye!
I warned you Braddock not to fuck with us.
Don't try to stop me Littlejohn.
I have tested many before, Braddock, and no one has lasted even an hour. Maybe you can be the first, eh?
I'll do whatever you want. Just let the boy go.
You will do what I want... anyways.

[preparing to torture Braddock]
You will find your first test quite challenging.
